name: Dark irc webchat (qwebirc)
description: Makes qwebirc pages dark to save your precious eyes.
additional_info:
It works with freenode, stormbit (bnc), rizon and oftc out-of-the-box.
Let me know if I missed any page and I'll try adding it as well.

If you feel like getting your hands dirty with code you can always edit the script once you have it installed and add your favorite qwebirc domain.
